name: Glass Gator
description: A large beast with a sleek, glass-like appearance, the Glass Gator is a formidable predator capable of thriving in both aquatic and terrestrial environments.
memorable: Its ability to turn transparent allows it to hide effectively underwater or in dim light, making it a surprise attacker.
goals: Hunts for food in water and on land, relying on stealth and ambush tactics.
relations: Can be encountered in the company of other aquatic beasts or as a solitary predator.
environment: Typically found in freshwater bodies like rivers, lakes, and swamps.
strengths: High mobility, impressive stealth capabilities, and powerful melee attacks.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma, making it poor at social interactions and complex tasks.
attacks: Can perform claw attacks dealing slashing damage and constricting movement with bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Constricting Lunge allows it to knock targets prone and follow up with a strong constrict attack.
senses: Possesses blindsight within a 60-foot radius, allowing it to perceive its surroundings even when blind.
skills: Has a decent Stealth skill, with an impressive modifier that enhances its ability to hide.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water.
Long jump up to 15 feet and high jump up to 10 feet.
Silt Cloud provides tactical advantage in combat by obscuring visibility.
